Content: Indian High commission states that they have reached the last phase of building 50000 houses to rehabilitants of 30-year-war in Sri Lanka. 46000 of these are built in North and Northern Eastern provinces while the rest are established in Central and Uva provinces. 43800 houses had been finished by 31 st December. Being Indiaâ€™s biggest contribution project in a foreign country, the project accounts for 270 million USD.
